title: Siam Dreams Restaurant and Lounge
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Thai, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Re-opened here 2015. Somewhat fancier than your typical restaurant, has lounge area and free Wi-Fi, Menu includes 2 pages of veg dishes comprising mostly Thai food with some western dishes like veggie burger (not vegan), lasagna, and salads; the pad Thai, a number of curries, and a papaya salad are vegan suitable. Operated by expats from Europe who also offer boat tours.
